Shaw BlueCurve Home

The Shaw BlueCurve Home app is an exclusive tool designed to elevate the digital living experience for Shaw Internet customers equipped with a BlueCurve Gateway. Obtain total command over your home WiFi network, with a variety of features to streamline your Internet consumption, elevate security, and personalize your connectivity experience.

  • Usage Monitoring: Keep tabs on internet consumption by profiles and devices, maintaining efficient data use üìä.
